title: nADuvEn unnaruLai
sahitya:
nADuvEn unnaruLai pADuvEn un pugazhai ADu mayil mElamar Arumukha nAthanE nAn


anupallavi

  ADum ambalavANar koNDADum kumaranE vEDuvak-kumariyODu kUDak-kAdal koNDavanE


caraNam    shentamizh mozhiyin tandai enat-tigazhum sundara svarUpan undan mahimai mighum
Vindaiyaip-pOTrum endan ishaip-pAkkaL shentamizh selvarin cintaiyaik-kavarndiDa
